Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
Occupying pride of place at the front of an established trio of freestanding residences, this solid three bedroom home with its own street frontage provides abundant living space in a position of convenience. Upon entry, the wide hallway features polished floors revealing the bright, carpeted formal lounge, a sophisticated entertaining area. Across the hall, the master bedroom boasts a walk-in wardrobe and a spacious ensuite. The home extends to the open kitchen, dining and family area, displaying polished floors and double doors directly accessing the paved alfresco area and garden, creating a flow of indoor/outdoor living. Featuring high ceilings, stainless-steel appliances including a 5-burner gas cooktop and a dishwasher, the large kitchen will entice keen cooks! Two more bedrooms with built-in wardrobes share a contemporary family bathroom with a separate shower and bathtub, adjacent to a separate toilet. The remote-controlled double garage offers both external and internal access and further highlights include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, with ample storage. Just metres from the vibrant Croydon North shopping strip, enjoy fabulous local convenience and a quick trip to Ringwood and EastLink.
Insights: Croydon North VIC 3136 was last sold in 2011 and 16 other 3 bedroom unit in Croydon North have recently been sold.

Description:
Lifestyle Prize in Central Croydon
Bathed in northerly sunshine and bursting with open plan space, this splendid apartment perfects lifestyle living with is premium location in central Croydon ensuring amenities are right on your doorstep. Well formed to offer separation between the living and sleeping quarters, the apartment offers the appeal of an entry foyer with cloak closet flowing freely through to the open plan living, dining and kitchen boasting Fisher & Paykel appliances, dish drawer dishwasher plus an island breakfast bench. Filling the space with natural light and offering a wonderful indoor-outdoor connection, sliding doors open onto a northerly oriented balcony thatâs superbly covered for all-weather enjoyment. A Euro laundry and family bathroom separate the two bedrooms from the living zone, with one of the bedrooms complemented by mirrored built-in-robes and private outdoor access for relaxed enjoyment. Further enhanced with split system heating/air conditioning, intercom entry, high ceilings plus a car space. Presenting a prized lifestyle only meters from Main St Croydon, Croydon Oval, Croydon Train Station, restaurants and cafes.
Insights: 54/13-15 Hewish Road, Croydon VIC 3136 was last sold in 2013.

Description:
Approved plans and permits for 3 modern townhouses!
Promising approved plans and permits to build 3 ultra-modern townhouses on an expansive 1044 sqm (approx.) of prime time Croydon land, this exceptional opportunity is a developers dream in a location just moments to picturesque parklands and terrific schools!
All the hard work has been done for you with townhouse plans and permits already ticked off by the council! On a sizeable flat block with very little trees, developers will love building the new residences, with plans allowing for one 4 bedroom townhouse and two other 3 bedroom townhouses. Each townhouse has a considered layout over two levels, and delivers generous proportions and amazing versatility. The current dwelling also comes with a secure lease for buyers who dont want to build straight away and can enjoy excellent rental returns!
Croydon locations dont get much better than this Diane Crescent address, which has you so close to Esther Park with sporting facilities and the Bushy Creek Trail, Manchester Primary School, Mooroolbark College, Barngeong Reserve Kindergarten, Mooroolbark Terrace Shopping Centre, buses, and Mooroolbark Station.
Insights: 60 Diane Crescent, Croydon VIC 3136 was last sold in 2010.

Description:
Stylish Unit in the Heart of Croydon
Offering first home buyers, investors and downsizers an exciting opportunity, this three bedroom unit is superbly located walking distance to Croydons popular shopping strip, cafés, restaurants and train station. Set in lush garden surrounds on a low maintenance 387sqm (approx.) allotment, it features a generous open-plan living/dining area and an open kitchen boasting a stainless-steel oven/cooktop and sleek benches The bedrooms are spacious with the master featuring a walk-in robe and ensuite, while the remaining beds include built-ins and share a sparkling central bathroom with separate WC. Complete with heating and cooling plus a single lock-up garage with internal access, this exceptional home demands your attention. Conveniently located near quality schools, parkland and bike paths with easy access to EastLink and the Eastern Freeway.
***PhilipWebb Real Estate Coronavirus Update***
The health of our valued clients and staff is our highest priority. Please note the following changes to our open for inspection processes as we navigate the current Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation.
Inspections are strictly by appointment only. Please register your contact details to arrange a private inspection with the listing agent
Attendees are limited to one agent and one prospective purchaser, who may be accompanied by one other person (either an existing household member or intimate partner) and their children under 18 years old if there are no appropriate alternative care arrangements available
Please maintain safe social distancing of 1.5m from anyone in attendance including PhilipWebb staff
Face masks must be worn at all times
Avoid touching surfaces including fittings and fixtures within the property
Hand sanitiser is provided
We kindly ask that you refrain from attending an inspection if you:
Are experiencing flu-like symptoms
Have tested positive to, or have recently been in contact with someone diagnosed with Coronavirus
Have recently travelled overseas or have been in direct contact with someone who has
Were all in this together and we thank you for your understanding.

Description:
Family comfort opposite serene park.
Set behind a charming picket fence and offering a tranquil view of the adjacent park, beyond the appealing exterior, this comfortable three-bedroom home delivers a light filled and relaxing atmosphere underpinned by a list of appreciable appointments throughout.
The enduring quality of this triple-fronted abode has withstood the test of time and promises to respond to your every need. Step inside and be greeted by the spacious lounge showcasing neutral tones and the warmth of polished floorboards that result in an undeniably comfortable and welcoming interior-a theme echoed throughout.
The home continues to impress with a well-equipped kitchen. Conveniently located adjoining the meals area and an absolute pleasure to work in, features include; stainless steel Chef electric oven, gas stove, dishwasher, large corner pantry, abundant bench space, tiled splashback and LED lights.
Good-sized bedrooms are rare, but this home accommodates well. The large master is fitted with a triple built-in robe while the additional two robed bedrooms are located off the same L-shaped hallway. The bathroom offers a relaxed space for quiet contemplation, incorporating a separate bath, shower, corner vanity and adjoining toilet.
Devoted to ensuring all the needs of a busy couple or family are met, the home conveniently provides; keyless entry, separate tiled laundry, gas ducted heating, air-conditioning, decorative wall panelling, enclosed front yard, low-maintenance rear courtyard and a generously-scaled covered entertaining area.
This home is situated only a short walk from McAdam Square Shopping Centre, Lipscombe Park Reserve, Ainslie Parklands Primary School, The Good Shepherd Primary School, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar. Mullum Mullum Creek Trail is at the end of the road and the home is also within close proximity to Croydon Railway Station, tennis courts, hospitals, Eastlink freeway and Croydon Memorial Pool.
A rare opening exists to acquire this spectacular property that not only caters to all your needs, but offers a uniquely beautiful location.
Insights: 30 Highland Avenue, Croydon VIC 3136 was last sold in 2020 and 184 other 3 bedroom house in Croydon have recently been sold.

Description:
Triple opportunity for family or investors
A unique opportunity ideally suited to extended families and investors, this quiet allotment houses a 2-3 bedroom home with 2 bedroom unit/home office which will help to offset the mortgage, all on the same title on this leafy Croydon street. A charming weatherboard with hardwood polished floors and original ceiling roses and cornices boasts street frontage. Displaying 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, master zoned on entry with chic rainfall ensuite and main bathroom with large corner bath indulgence.
Open plan design encompasses living, dining and a vibrant high-end European integrated fire, requiring minimal maintenance and delivering maximum efficiency. Matched with a stylish kitchen with s/s oven, gas cooktop and dishwasher. Host guests on a front verandah with covered area or back decking linking to a separate studio with bed/living, smart bathroom with BI laundry and rainfall shower, brand new soft-close kitchen with electric cooker, dishwasher and breakfast bar. Next door to a self-contained 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom (2 WCs) unit with living and kitchen disability compliant with ramp and railings. All dwellings have a large common garden.
An ideal arrangement for families with older parents/inlaws, university students or children saving for a house. It also represents a great opportunity to lease 1 or all 3.
Walk to restaurants and cafes and minutes to Burnt Bridge and McAdam Square shops plus a range of quality schools incl Kalinda PS, Good Shepherd PS, Yarra Valley GS, Rudolf Steiner School, Luther College and Melba College. Buses depart at the top of the street with great connections to Croydon Station. Explore the nearby Mullum Mullum Trail on foot or atop a bike and ride to Eastland and Town Square for a weekend brunch. Minutes to freeway and Eastlink and a leisurely drive to the Yarra Valley wineries.
The main house additionally, offers split system heating cooling, laundry, 3kw solar roof panels, a repointed and resprayed roof and off-street parking for 3 cars.
The studio and unit have polished floorboards, separate electricity meters and split system heating/cooling and the unit additionally offers a separate gas meter, side gate access and is currently leased for $300 PW.
Insights: 8 Robinson Street, Croydon VIC 3136 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 4 bedroom house in Croydon have recently been sold.

Description:
The PERFECT home!! You've found it!!!
Please follow us on Facebook, YouTube, LinkedIn and Instagram for regular fresh content search "Babet Brothers Real Estate".
Ladies and Gentleman, do we have an amazing opportunity for you today, perfect for both first home buyers, investors, down sizers or young families and located in an excellent location and a short distance to shops, schools and reserves. LOCATION.TICK!!
Resting on a good sized 464m2 block the home itself features 3 great sized bedrooms and a decent yard, simply PERFECT.
This home has it all and features lovely hardwood floors throughout. The living area is generous in its proportions and features a good sized functional kitchen with plenty of bench top space and freestanding stainless steel oven and cooktop. There is also a walk in butlers pantry! How good is that!
The kitchen overlooks the dining area so that you can be right there in the action with family and friends whilst preparing your meals.
The home has heating to keep you warm in winter and air conditioning to keep you cool in summer.
The home presents extremely well, you will love it. There is nothing to spend. Simply pack your things and move straight in.
Location, location, location.everything is either a short drive or walking distance away!
-Eastland shopping centre
-Schools
-Reserves/Parkes
-Train station
-Local shops
Dont miss out. This home will sell fast. Contact the Babet Brothers today to avoid missing out!
Contact Deej Babet on: 0403 247 200
Contact Matt Babet on: 0401 861 185

Vacant Land - Plans to Build 2 Single Storey Dwellings
This is a unique opportunity to either build your brand new dream home or take advantage of the current permits which have been approved for building 2 side by side single-storey 4 bedroom Metricon Homes.
With a wide street frontage of 20.73m and a depth of 41.76m, this block will suit the construction of a wide range of new homes.
Topped off with a location which has you within close proximity to the heart of Croydon and Mooroolbark, opportunities like this one don't come onto the market very often.

Description:
A Sensational Setting for Lifestyle Convenience
Immerse yourself in the heart of all the action with this spotless, split-level townhouse in Croydon's vibrant town centre. Situated directly opposite Croydon Park, it's only a minute's stroll to the eateries and shops in Croydon's Main Street, Croydon Train Station and Croydon Central Shopping Centre.
- Cosy & inviting interior with neutral fixtures & fittings to suit any style
- Boasting high ceilings, plush carpet and an open plan design
- Well-equipped kitchen comprises stainless steel appliances and dishwasher
- Adjoining living room with large feature bay window
- Two spacious second floor bedrooms include built-in robes and enjoy their own private balcony
- Serviced by a spotless, central bathroom with shower over bath
- Split system heating & cooling for seasonal comfort
- Secure storage cubicle and single car space
- Picturesque views of Croydon Park
- Additional features include Euro laundry and security door entry

Description:
Contemporary Style with Architect Influence
**As per government COVID-19 restrictions, no physical inspections will be conducted until after stage 4 lockdown**
Masterfully designed by renowned architect Hank Romyn, this wonderfully styled residence is more than a family home, its a statement of contemporary style and unique living. Occupying a private 965m2 approx. with ample off street parking, a large double garage and an elevated outdoor deck with spa, the split level interior is a showcase of light, texture and inviting living and bedroom spaces, highlighting a zoned master on the top floor with an ensuite bathroom and a walk in wardrobe. Occupying the front of the home are the other two bedrooms which both provide outdoor access and are comfortably serviced by the main bathroom with sauna. Taking centre stage is the main living room with wood fire and the galley style kitchen with walk in pantry and adjoining laundry and third toilet. Ideally located for optimum convenience, Croydon transport and shops are a short walk or commute away, with Croydon North shops, Chirnside Park and Mooroolbark also close by.

Description:
Striking Street Frontage
Positioned in a quiet no-through road in the absolute heart of Croydon and within walking distance of Main Street.
Inside you will find a large open lounge with polished hardwood floors, fully equiped kitchen with dishwasher, stainless steel appliances and spacious meals area.
The meals area flows onto a large rear deck containing built-in lighting and a generous sized private, low maintenance rear yard.
Upstairs is the designated sleeping quarters with two bedrooms with built in robes, large master with ensuite- effect main bathroom. Other quality features include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, downstairs laundry and powder room, storage shed plus single garage with remote door and rear access.
This is an exceptional property in an incredibly convenient location, walk to Silcock Reserve, Warrien Reserve, Croydon Primary School, Luther College, Croydon Station and Croydon Central Shopping centre. Call now to book a private inspection.

Description:
UNIQUE FREESTANDING UNIT
With a focus on easy living, this inviting freestanding brick unit is the perfect match for those wanting privacy, security and comfort with an opportunity to modernise and add their own stamp. Delightful with its blooming roses adding colour to its own street frontage, this homely retreat opens to a generous meals area adjacent to a well-equipped kitchen with dishwasher both with light-filled views to the covered alfresco courtyard where you can relax and entertain year-round. Clever use of space also incorporates a separate large living room with timber plantation shutters for cosy downtime. Spaciously proportioned, you will further discover two bedrooms with the master featuring a full ensuite plus walk in robe and an additional family bathroom.
The compact allotment also features a single carport with roller door boasting internal and rear access plus additional off-street parking. Additionally, there is split system air-conditioning for seasonal comfort.
An idyllic first home, downsizer, investment or retiree's nest with its own sense of independence, the property is located minutes from the heart of Croydon and all its wonderful amenities including cafes, restaurants, supermarkets, cinemas, pools and schools. Dont delay. Enquire today.

Description:
Family sanctuary in quiet court.
Few people ever enjoy such a privileged position as this spacious Croydon family home, located within an esteemed court and designed to afford the occupants a quiet, comfortable and quality lifestyle, all within close proximity to superb local amenities.
Positioned on an a generous yet easy care 1058m2 (approx.) block, the layout of the home has been carefully planned to make occupants completely comfortable. Designed over a single level, from the modern brick exterior to the warm and welcoming interior, the residence is sure to impressespecially the versatile floorplan which is zoned and will see toddlers grow into teens.
Whether you're relaxing and enjoying the spa and outdoor alfresco area or light, bright formal lounge and dining the home offers a unique outlook of its own and an ambience of rest and calm. Adjoining the family dining area, the kitchen features a stainless steel electric oven and stove, large pantry, in addition to ample cupboard space, tiled backsplash and breakfast bar.
Boasting four bedrooms, the residence truly delivers in terms of flexible and generous accommodation, providing a huge master retreat zoned away from the further three robed bedrooms and casual areas. A large study with back to back built in desks and shelving, enough room for three people, lending itself to school studies or be utilised as home business and more.
Carefully designed to grow a family, ensuring that every need is well and truly met. Additional highlights include; separate laundry, main bathroom with separate shower and bathtub, gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling, ceiling fans, generous storage throughout, double garage with rear yard access plus abundant off-street parking and low-maintenance rear yard.
This home is positioned only moments to Croydon Railway Station, Exeter Road shopping strip, local bus stop, Preschools and Kindergartens, Quality primary and secondary schooling options and just a brief drive from EastLink freeway and Eastland Shopping Centre.
This spacious residence presents an opportunity to acquire a genuinely warm and inviting family sanctuary.
To schedule a private inspection, please contact one of our agents.

Description:
WOW! Can't wait to tell mum about this one
Live like a king in this Brand New 34sq luxury family home with four master bedrooms plus fifth bedroom/study that could easily become a private retreat for visiting family. One master bedroom is downstairs; three master bedrooms upstairs with either walk in or built in wardrobe and opulent beauty enhancement bathroom = premium matt calacatta floor to ceiling porcelain tiles, black frame shower, matt black rose gold fittings for the self-indulgent.
Offering the extended family many areas to build relationships including a theatre room, formal living room, plus very spacious open plan living area that expands to private, low maintenance courtyard, entertainment space.
Be liked! Be loved! Buy this perfect home and add fun to life by entertaining to your hearts content utilising the butlers kitchen with bosch oven; cooktop and what seems like warehouse size storage, or just use the designer kitchen featuring oversized ceaser stone benchtops, designer splashback, 900mm six burner cooktop, bosch oven, soft close drawers and cupboards and dishwasher in order to delight your family and guests with gourmet or home style cooking.
Easily convert the theatre and 5th bedroom into a retreat for overseas guests or generational family members living with you.
We have left some features for you to discover when you come to look however here is a shortened list:
Natural european oak timber floor
Stainless steel bosh appliances
Premium 2 pac soft close kitchen cabinets
Ceaser stone benchtops in laundry, kitchen and butlers kitchen
Designer splashbacks
Premium porcelain tiles
Matt black/rose gold tap fittings
Reverse Cycle heating and cooling
Digital lock [no key for entry]
Remote entry double garage
Entry to home direct from garage
No through road adding to privacy
Near Croydon Central
Walk to Main St Shops
Croydon Train Station
Dorset Recreation Reserve
Ruskin Primary School
Yarra Hills Secondary College
PS This is a unique property on the market and deserves your attention.

Description:
The Trifecta of Choice
Impeccably designed and built to reach the highest of expectations, these three brand new townhouses invite the interest from all buyers groups. Situated close to shops and transport, these homes are completed to impressive standards to incorporate welcoming creature comforts like ducted heating and evaporative cooling found on both levels, as well as introducing stunning Spotted Gum engineered flooring and stone bench tops in the kitchen. The choice is yours from the front four bedroom layout which heads the group of three with street frontage, with two bathrooms, to the rear two options which both offer three bedrooms with two bathrooms. Double garages, a crisp white interior, high ceilings, quality Bosch stainless steel appliances, carpeted bedrooms with either built in or walk in robes for the master, along with open plan living and dining, security systems and landscaped gardens with a shed and a water tank are also featured
Insights: First listed on 16 October, this property has been on Domain for 4 days (last updated on 16 October).
